title: Remove Caffeine attribution from LandingScreen footer

requirements.summary: Remove the Caffeine attribution line from the LandingScreen footer while keeping remaining footer content intact and well-spaced.
acceptanceCriteria: On the home/landing screen, the footer no longer shows any "Built with" / "created by" / "caffeine.ai" attribution text or link.
The Privacy Policy link remains present and functional.
Footer layout still looks consistent (no excessive empty gap where the removed line was).

file_operations.description: Remove the "Built with ❤️ using caffeine.ai" footer paragraph including its external link, and adjust the footer's spacing classes if needed so Privacy Policy and copyright remain visually balanced.
